categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Juble were a pair of Cargo ferries used by the Rebel Alliance.

The ferries were trying to escape an attack by the Imperial frigate Lighting onto an Alliance starfighter base consisting of 3 Class-A cargo containers Retuna, Reyve and Garble, multiple starfighters used by the Rebels, a single transport Trole and two tugs Toone. The base was destroyed and the ferries carrying the crew of the base were also destroyed before they could escape.
